෴෴ hithuwakkarige hitha ෴෴: - danduwama - oya siddhiyen passe mata ee miswa tikak epa wuna.mokada hithuwakkari wunath hithu ehema danga wada karala na wadiyama.podi athapasuwimakata payak withara panthiyen eliyata damma nisa hithu hithagena hitiye ee mis harima napuruyi kiyala.kohoma hari ithin passe kaleka thaththath siddhiya danagaththa.tikak tharahath giya.dukath hithuna.thaththata kiwwe naththe ayi kiyalath dos ahaganna wuna.
